Facebook Instagram

Welcome to the

Mission Inn Foundation

Take A Tour

Step into history on a Mission Inn Museum tour, exploring the rich heritage of the City of Riverside. Tours begin at our new storefront in Downtown Riverside: 3598 Main Street.
LEARN MORE >

Go Shopping

Discover treasures at the Mission Inn Museum storeunique Riverside gifts, books, and souvenirs capturing the allure of the Mission Inn. Available at our new storefront in Downtown Riverside: 3750 Market St.
LEARN MORE >

The Mission Inn Foundation, a 501c3 non-profit organization, was founded in 1976 to preserve, interpret, and promote the cultural heritage of the Mission Inn.
